summary: This mod changes the enchantment on the necromancers robe to suit the necromancer style a bit more.
descriptionHtml:
This is a quick mod i decided to do to give the Necromancers Robes and hooded robes an more immersive enchantment.

The enchantment is now 50 points of fortify conjuration, 50 points of fortify magicka regen and 20 points of damage stamina regen for balance.

Please comment if you want me to change anything about this mod, i'll be happy to listen.

This is my first mod so if you think it is bad that's fine.
author: Dragonblood13
